DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect patupilone pharmacokinetics warfarin patient advanced malignancy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Patupilone Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Warfarin Patients With Advanced Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Participation study EPO906A2120E1 Age ≥ 18 year age Life expectancy ≥ 3 month Histologically document advanced solid tumor progress standard systemic therapy standard systemic therapy exist Completed PK sample core study Exclusion criterion Known diagnosis human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection , hepatitis Female patient pregnant breast feed Patients severe and/or uncontrolled medical disease Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
